mapper.sql: id, oredertitle_code, goods_id, goods_name, category_id, category_name, goods_num, price, money, quote_id, exe_sendgoods_num, exe_getgoods_num, exe_returngoods_num, exe_getreturngoods_num, exe_paymoney_num, exe_getmoney_num, exe_refund_num, exe_getrefund_num, sendgoods_num, getgoods_num, returngoods_num, getreturngoods_num, paymoney_num, getmoney_num, refund_num, getrefund_num, lockmoney_num, buyers_id, buyers_name, sellers_id, sellers_name, status, remark, workflow_type,stop_status,execute_status, lock_time,finish_time,create_time,user_id,user_name
mapper.select:
select
from mt_order
and buyers_id = #{buyersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and exe_paymoney_num>0 GROUP BY sellers_name
and sellers_id = #{sellersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and exe_paymoney_num>0 GROUP BY buyers_name

select m.ordertitle_code ordertitle_number, t.id, t.oredertitle_code, t.goods_id, t.goods_name, t.category_id, t.category_name, t.goods_num, t.price, t.money, t.quote_id, t.exe_sendgoods_num, t.exe_getgoods_num, t.exe_returngoods_num, t.exe_getreturngoods_num, t.exe_paymoney_num, t.exe_getmoney_num, t.exe_refund_num, t.exe_getrefund_num, t.sendgoods_num, t.getgoods_num, t.returngoods_num, t.getreturngoods_num, t.paymoney_num, t.getmoney_num, t.refund_num, t.getrefund_num, t.lockmoney_num, t.buyers_id, t.buyers_name, t.sellers_id, t.sellers_name, t.status, t.remark, t.workflow_type,t.stop_status,t.execute_status from mt_order t join mt_ordertitle m on t.oredertitle_code = m.id where t.sellers_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.ordertitle_code = #{ordertitleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.exe_sendgoods_num > 0 and t.execute_status = 1 and t.status = 4 limit #{startFirst},#{startEnd}

select m.ordertitle_code ordertitle_number, t.id, t.oredertitle_code, t.goods_id, t.goods_name, t.category_id, t.category_name, t.goods_num, t.price, t.money, t.quote_id, t.exe_sendgoods_num, t.exe_getgoods_num, t.exe_returngoods_num, t.exe_getreturngoods_num, t.exe_paymoney_num, t.exe_getmoney_num, t.exe_refund_num, t.exe_getrefund_num, t.sendgoods_num, t.getgoods_num, t.returngoods_num, t.getreturngoods_num, t.paymoney_num, t.getmoney_num, t.refund_num, t.getrefund_num, t.lockmoney_num, t.buyers_id, t.buyers_name, t.sellers_id, t.sellers_name, t.status, t.remark, t.workflow_type,t.stop_status,t.execute_status from mt_order t join mt_ordertitle m on t.oredertitle_code = m.id where t.buyers_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.ordertitle_code = #{ordertitleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.exe_getgoods_num > 0 and t.execute_status = 1 and t.status = 4 limit #{startFirst},#{startEnd}

mapper.insert: insert into mt_order (id, oredertitle_code, goods_id, goods_name, category_id, category_name, goods_num, price, money, quote_id, exe_sendgoods_num, exe_getgoods_num, exe_returngoods_num, exe_getreturngoods_num, exe_paymoney_num, exe_getmoney_num, exe_refund_num, exe_getrefund_num, sendgoods_num, getgoods_num, returngoods_num, getreturngoods_num, paymoney_num, getmoney_num, refund_num, getrefund_num, lockmoney_num, buyers_id, buyers_name, sellers_id, sellers_name, status, remark, workflow_type,stop_status,execute_status, lock_time,finish_time,create_time,user_id,user_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oredertitleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{quoteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exeSendgoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{exeGetgoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{exeReturngoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{exeGetreturngoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{exePaymoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{exeGetmoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{exeRefundNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{exeGetrefundNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sendgoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{getgoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{returngoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{getreturngoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{paymoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{getmoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{refundNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{getrefundNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lockmoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buyersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workflowType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{stopStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{executeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update mt_order set id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oredertitle_code = #{oredertitleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, quote_id = #{quoteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exe_sendgoods_num = #{exeSendgoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, exe_getgoods_num = #{exeGetgoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, exe_returngoods_num = #{exeReturngoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, exe_getreturngoods_num = #{exeGetreturngoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, exe_paymoney_num = #{exePaymoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, exe_getmoney_num = #{exeGetmoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, exe_refund_num = #{exeRefundNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, exe_getrefund_num = #{exeGetrefundNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sendgoods_num = #{sendgoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, getgoods_num = #{getgoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, returngoods_num = #{returngoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, getreturngoods_num = #{getreturngoodsNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, paymoney_num = #{paymoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, getmoney_num = #{getmoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, refund_num = #{refundNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, getrefund_num = #{getrefundNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lockmoney_num = #{lockmoneyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, buyers_id = #{buyersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyers_name = #{buyersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sellers_id = #{sellersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sellers_name = #{sellersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workflow_type = #{workflowType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stop_status = #{stopStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, execute_status = #{executeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lock_time = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
